#include <stdio.h>

int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	long long n,i,p;

	long long int arr[1000] ={0};
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	for(i = 0 ; i < n; i++)
	{
	    scanf("%lld",&p);
	    arr[p]++;
	   
	}
	long long max =arr[0],index =0;
	for(i = 0; i< n-1; i++)
	{
	    if(arr[i+1] > arr[i])
	    {
	        index = i+1;
	        max=arr[i+1];
	    }
	}
	printf("%lld\n",index);
	printf("%lld\n",max);
	return 0;
}
